member.remarks: Dispute dapat dibuat oleh pengirim atau penerima transfer. Transfer akan ditandai sebagai "Disputed" dan dana akan ditahan sampai dispute diselesaikan oleh admin.

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.DisputesController.GetDisputes(System.String)
member.param: Filter by status: Open, UnderReview, WaitingForEvidence, Resolved, Cancelled

member.summary: Add a message to dispute conversation

member.summary: Cancel a dispute (only initiator can cancel)

member.name: T:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.TransfersController
member.summary: Escrow transfer endpoints - send money safely with hold period

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.TransfersController.CreateTransfer(FeatureService.Api.DTOs.CreateTransferRequest)
member.summary: Create a new escrow transfer to another user - REQUIRES 2FA + PIN
member.remarks: Transfer menggunakan sistem escrow: - Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) MUST be enabled - PIN verification required for each transfer - Dana ditahan selama hold period (default 24 jam, maksimal 72 jam) - Penerima bisa meng-klaim dana setelah hold period selesai - Pengirim bisa membatalkan sebelum dana diklaim - Fee 2% dipotong saat dana dilepaskan

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.TransfersController.GetTransfers(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get transfer history with optional filters
member.param: Filter by status: pending, completed, cancelled, expired, disputed
Filter by role: sender, receiver, or null for both

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.TransfersController.ReleaseTransfer(System.String,FeatureService.Api.DTOs.ReleaseTransferRequest)
member.summary: Release transfer - receiver claims the funds after hold period
member.remarks: Hanya penerima yang bisa melepaskan dana setelah hold period selesai. Fee 2% akan dipotong saat pelepasan.

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.TransfersController.CancelTransfer(System.String,FeatureService.Api.DTOs.CancelTransferRequest)
member.summary: Cancel transfer - sender cancels before completion
member.remarks: Pengirim dapat membatalkan transfer yang masih pending atau dalam hold period. Dana akan dikembalikan ke pengirim tanpa potongan fee.

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.TransfersController.SearchUser(System.String)
member.summary: Search for a user to send transfer to

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.WalletsController.GetPinStatus
member.summary: Get PIN status (set/not set, locked/not locked)

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.WalletsController.SetPin(FeatureService.Api.DTOs.SetPinRequest)
member.summary: Set PIN for first time - REQUIRES 2FA ENABLED
member.remarks: ⚠️ SECURITY WARNING ⚠️ - Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) MUST be enabled before setting PIN - PIN CANNOT be reset - there is NO recovery option - If you forget your PIN, you will permanently lose access to financial features - Write your PIN on paper and store it in a safe place - Do not share your PIN with anyone, including support staff

member.name: T:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.WithdrawalsController
member.summary: Withdrawal endpoints for cashing out wallet balance to bank

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.WithdrawalsController.CreateWithdrawal(FeatureService.Api.DTOs.CreateWithdrawalRequest)
member.summary: Request a new withdrawal to bank account - REQUIRES 2FA + PIN
member.remarks: SECURITY: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) MUST be enabled. Penarikan akan diproses oleh tim dalam 1-3 hari kerja. Fee penarikan: Rp2,500 per transaksi. Minimal: Rp10,000, Maksimal: Rp100,000,000

member.name: M:FeatureService.Api.Controllers.Finance.WithdrawalsController.GetWithdrawals(System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: Filter by status: Pending, Processing, Completed, Rejected, Cancelled

member.summary: Represents a token usage record for AI services

member.name: T:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger
member.summary: Immutable transaction ledger for double-entry bookkeeping. Every transaction creates TWO ledger entries (debit and credit). This ensures full auditability and balance verification.

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger.UserId
member.summary: UserID this ledger entry belongs to

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger.EntryType
member.summary: Type of transaction entry (debit or credit)

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger.BalanceAfter
member.summary: Running balance after this transaction (for quick validation)

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger.TransactionType
member.summary: Transaction type (deposit, transfer_in, transfer_out, withdrawal, fee, etc.)

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger.ReferenceId
member.summary: Reference ID to link related ledger entries (e.g., both sides of a transfer)

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger.ExternalReference
member.summary: External reference (e.g., payment gateway transaction ID)

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.TransactionLedger.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when this entry was created (immutable)

member.name: T:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWallet
member.summary: Represents a user's wallet with their balance and PIN status. This is a mutable aggregate derived from the immutable TransactionLedger.

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWallet.UserId
member.summary: UserID from the Go backend (PostgreSQL User table)

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWallet.Balance
member.summary: Current balance in IDR (smallest unit - Rupiah) This is calculated from the ledger entries

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWallet.PinHash
member.summary: Hashed PIN using PBKDF2 with 310,000 iterations

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWallet.PinSet
member.summary: Indicates whether the user has set up their PIN

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWallet.FailedPinAttempts
member.summary: Number of failed PIN verification attempts (for rate limiting) Max 4 attempts before lock

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWallet.PinLockedUntil
member.summary: Timestamp when PIN was locked due to too many failed attempts (4 attempts = 4 hours lock)

member.name: T:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWarning
member.summary: Represents a warning issued to a user by admin. Warnings accumulate and can lead to bans.

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWarning.ReportId
member.summary: Report ID that led to this warning (if applicable)

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWarning.Message
member.summary: Detailed message shown to the user

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWarning.Acknowledged
member.summary: Whether the user has acknowledged this warning

member.name: P:FeatureService.Api.Models.Entities.UserWarning.AcknowledgedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when user acknowledged the warning

member.summary: Withdrawal request for cashing out wallet balance to bank account
